name: spot-web
description: Homepage for the SPOT group at the University of Michigan
author: Steve Oney <soney@umich.edu>

scripts.build: ruby scripts/generate-paper-pages.rb && ruby scripts/generate-person-pages.rb && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.develop: ruby scripts/generate-paper-pages.rb && ruby scripts/generate-person-pages.rb && bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && ruby scripts/generate-paper-pages.rb && ruby scripts/generate-person-pages.rb && bundle exec jekyll build && npx gh-pages -d _site
